name: Hitmonchan
description: Its punches slice the air. However, it seems to need a short break after fighting for three minutes.

attacks.name: Detect
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Hitmonchan during your opponent’s next turn.
